What are some benefits of using Verus Mobile?

Verus Mobile allows you to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) within the application, and it also enables MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions. Additionally, it provides a convenient way to manage your Verus address on the go.

# Get a Verus address There are a few ways to get a Verus address on desktop and on mobile. ## Verus Mobile Download Verus Mobile from the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/en/app/verus-mobile/id6447361908) or [Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.autonomoussoftwarefoundation.verusmobile.android&hl=en&gl=US) Use Verus Mobile to bridge from Ethereum to Verus (or vice versa) all within the application. And use it for MEV-resistant and low-cost conversions: [more on Verus DeFi](/sendcurrency) ## Verus Desktop Download Verus Desktop for Windows, macOS, Linux or Linux ARM [here](https://verus.io/wallet). Run a full node (native mode) to experience all protocol features.
